A screengrab from the early release of Season  of Orange Is the New Black PERIOD Season  came out June  when it was scheduled to be released June  PERIOD

The third season of Orange Is the New Black has been made available on Netflix a day ahead of schedule PERIOD

Unlike earlier in the year when House of Cards was leaked early this time the entire season is ready to watch PERIOD

Click here to start bingewatching the brand new season and check out a preview of it below PERIOD
